bio.name: Tanishk Khare
bio.summary: Passionate about building innovative software solutions using computer science skills and exploring new technologies.
hobbies: Exploring AI tools and innovation enthusiast

projects.title: Voice Portfolio AI
projects.description: An interactive voice-based portfolio that simulates a phone call experience. Users can ask questions about me, and my AI responds using real-time speech synthesis, powered by OpenAI and Web Speech API.
features: Smart response system based on embedded JSON data
challenges: Smooth UI updates between speech events

projects.title: Course Selling App
projects.description: A backend application for selling online courses, complete with user authentication, protected routes, and a role-based admin dashboard.
features: CRUD functionality for courses and users

experience.description: Built AI voice portfolio and course selling app, handling frontend, backend, and API integration.
